response.overview: The 10th episode of the "Reiwa Eros Story" series will be "~Love~". This time, it's split into two parts. The first part is a story of mother-son incest that perfectly encapsulated the idea of ​​"forbidden." He was a son who didn't get along with his stepfather. This young man was devoted to his studies, but finally his conscription notice arrived. The day before he goes to war, his mother slips into her son's futon naked in the middle of the night... and then just before the end credits he says, "Mom, you were the only woman I ever loved...".  The second story is "The Devil's Woman". Mari Yamaguchi plays a prostitute who is interviewed by a magazine reporter Kawakami.  A man's strangled body was discovered in a love hotel where he had called a call girl. Legendary call girl Maki Hojo is questioned by police. Kawakami is shown how Hojo treats a man and becomes fascinated by the technique. So while Kawakami was writing the article, it was also about her own experiences as a call girl.
response.title: Reiwa Eros Story: Love
